Article: Three visions of the future
Mira has tried to tell me all along that she was seeing things in advance. Why didn't you report it?
Huh. Laura, when you say you're having visions of the past, or flashes of future events, I'm not doubting you.
Come here, beloved daughter, and tell us what evidence you have that your visions aren't from the Devil?
You are not a man of mercy... for your visions have not revealed to you what mercy is... and so why do you do this?
Think, my visions don't come from ... from here, you know.
Major, these visions may be important but I think we're all in agreement here that they are not as important as Captain Sisko's life.
These visions are gifts. I can't refuse them.
Wess, you've been taking sightings and adding figures, what does it come out to?
You're losing it and you're doing clandestine advertising to boot.
What are our projects, our visions and our strategy for years to come?
